channel.title: Read topic for explanation
channel.description:
Need help coding something in my server...
Well when I first started off my server I noticed that when you click on a teleport in your spell book and it has the options on where you wanna go, in most rsps they make it so when move the teleport option thingy goes away, mine doesn't have that it just stays there even when you move so you have to tele to get it away...
Its hard to explain but if you know what I mean please help!
Thanks, Me

item.title: Read topic for explanation
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Add a check to see if they’re moving, if they aren’t then show the interface, if so close.

Check out a skill with an interface that closes (cooking, fletching, crafting, herblore, etc) when moving for reference.

Read full topic
